original: intros eqb_eq x y H. split. - intros eqb_eq_true. induction x; induction y; simpl in *. + reflexivity. + discriminate. + discriminate. + discriminate. + discriminate. + apply andb_true_iff in eqb_eq_true. destruct eqb_eq_true as [eqb_eq_true1 eqb_eq_true2]. apply (IHx1 y1) in eqb_eq_true1. apply (IHx2 y2) in eqb_eq_true2. congruence. - intros. generalize dependent y. induction x; destruct y; simpl; intros; try discriminate. + reflexivity. + apply andb_true_iff. inversion H; subst. split. * apply (IHx1 y1); auto. * apply (IHx2 y2); auto.
